target: Such facilities are also being considered by Lundin and Det norske oljeselskap for 16/1-8 “Luno” and 16/1-9 “Draupne”, respectively, on the Utsira High in the North Sea.

source: Kartleggingen av det nye norske havområdet nordøst i Barentshavet startet i fjor.

source: Tre søyler på området er viet ulike tema.
target: Three columns in the area are dedicated to different topics.

source: ”Evalueringen konkluderer at den norske petroleumsrettede assistansen har gjort riktig bruk av kunnskapen i den norske petroleumssektoren.
target: ”The evaluation concludes that the Norwegian petroleum-related assistance has made proper use of the Norwegian petroleum sector knowledge.

source: - Ellers prioriterer vi felt med spesielle problemstillinger, det være seg økt utvinning, områdevurderinger, eller felt der spørsmålet om olje- eller gass blir en problemstilling, sier han.
target: “We otherwise give priority to fields which raise special issues, such as improved recovery, area assessment, or the choice between oil or gas production.”

source: Avgrensningsbrønnene 24/9-9 A og -9 B ble boret til vertikalt dyp på henholdsvis 2110 og 2093 meter under havflaten, og begge ble avsluttet i Seleformasjonen i øvre paleocen.
target: Appraisal wells 24/9-9 A and -9 B were drilled to vertical depths of 2110 and 2093 m below the sea surface, respectively, and both were terminated in the Sele formation in the Upper Paleocene.

source: Funnet opereres av DEA.
target: The discovery is operated by DEA.

source: Brønnen ble boret til et vertikalt dyp av 2487 meter under havflaten og ble avsluttet i Shetlandgruppen i øvre kritt.
target: The well was drilled to a vertical depth of 2487 metres below the sea surface and was terminated in the Shetland group in the Upper Cretaceous.

source: Det holdt til hovedpremien – en iPhone 4S.

target: The primary and secondary exploration targets for well 35/11-20 S were to prove petroleum in Late Jurassic reservoir rocks (intra Heather formation sandstone).

source: Foreløpige beregninger av størrelsen på funnet er mellom en og fire milliarder standard kubikkmeter (Sm3) utvinnbar gass.
target: Preliminary calculations of the size of the discovery are between one and four billion standard cubic metres (Sm3) of recoverable gas.

source: I tillegg var formålet å optimalisere dreneringsstrategien for å kunne plassere utvinningsbrønner best mulig i dette området.
target: In addition, the purpose was to optimise the drainage strategy for the best possible location of production wells in this area.

target: The Ministry of the Environment plans to submit a Storting White Paper on the comprehensive management plan during the spring of 2009.

source: Begge brønnene ble avsluttet i grunnfjell.

source: I mellomtiden kan lagring av CO2 få stor betydning.

source: Arealet i dette løyvet er ein del av blokk 6407/1.
target: The area in this licence is a part of block 6407/1.

source: Effektiviteten av et gasskraftverk på land avhenger av beliggenheten av kraftverket.
target: The efficiency of a gas power plant on land depends on where the power plant is located.

target: The drilling operation was carried out by the semi-submersible drilling facility West Alpha, which will now continue drilling an appraisal well on the 6406/9-1 gas discovery in the same production license.

source: Basert på dagens kunnskap er hovedkonklusjonene at:

source: Trenden er at oljeproduksjonen synker mens gassandelen øker.
target: Declining overall oil production with a growing share of gas is the trend.

source: Dette er den første letebrønnen i utvinningstillatelse 713.
target: This is the first exploration well in production licence 713.

target: Oil about 53.4 million Sm3 o.e., NGL and Condensate about 10.2 million Sm3 o.e. and Gas about 56.8 million Sm3 o.e..

source: Noreco er operatør med 50 prosent del.
target: Noreco is the operator with a 50 per cent ownership interest.

target: The well was drilled 65 km northwest of the 7220/8-1 Johan Castberg oil and gas discovery in the Barents Sea and 300 km northwest of Hammerfest.

source: I forrige konsesjonsrunde var 37 selskap med i nominasjonen.
target: 37 companies participated in the nominations for the previous licensing round.

target: Well 10/4-1 is the first exploration well in this production licence.

source: I Troms II er det størst sannsynlighet for gass.
target: In Troms II, gas appears to be the most likely possibility.

source: Avgrensningsbrønnen 30/11-10 A er boret inn i reservoaret nord for funnbrønnen 30/11-8 S.
target: Appraisal well 30/11-10 A was drilled into the reservoir north of discovery well 30/11-8 S.

source: Det ble gjort 12 nye funn på sokkelen i andre kvartal.
target: Twelve new discoveries were made on the shelf in the second quarter.

source: Utvinningsløyve 450 blei tildelt Det norske oljeselskap i 2008 (TFO 2007).

source: Total mektighet på Zechsteingruppen er på 67 meter.
target: The total thickness of the Zechstein group is 67 metres.

source: Ny petroleums-app >
target: New petroleum app >

source: Brønnen er boret om lag 115 kilometer nordvest for Hammerfest og om lag 50 kilometer vest for Goliatfeltet.
target: The well has been drilled about 115 kilometres northwest of Hammerfest and about 50 kilometres west of the Goliat field.

source: Løyvet blei i 2008 del frå utvinningsløyve 159, som blei tildelt i konsesjonsrunde 12 B i 1989.
target: The licence was carved out of production licence 159 in 2008, which was awarded in licensing round 12 B in 1989.

source: Både Garn-og Ileformasjonene hadde forventet reservoarkvalitet, men med noe tynnere mektigheter enn forventet.
target: Both the Garn and Ile formations had the expected reservoir quality, but were somewhat thinner than expected.

source: Produksjonen frå Tordis, Vale og Volund var redusert pga. tekniske problem.
target: Production from Tordis, Vale and Volund fields was reduced due to technical problems.

source: Oljedirektoratets seismiske innsamling 2011 og 2012
target: The Norwegian Petroleum Directorate's seismic acquisition in 2011 and 2012.

source: OD har, basert på innrapporterte tall, estimert at det skal plugges om lag 40 – 50 brønner per år de nærmeste årene.
target: The NPD has, based on reported figures, estimated that about 40 – 50 wells are scheduled to be plugged each year over the next few years.

source: Brønnene er boret om lag 13 kilometer øst for Ulafeltet i den sørlige delen av Nordsjøen.
target: The wells were drilled about 13 kilometres east of the Ula field in the southern part of the North Sea.

source: I 2006 var den samlede eksporten av petroleum fra norsk sokkel drøyt 249 millioner salgbare standard kubikkmeter oljeekvivalenter.
target: In 2006, the total volume of petroleum exported from the Norwegian shelf amounted to about 249 million marketable cubic metres of oil equivalents.

source: «I tillegg viser ny kartlegging at det er store muligheter i områder som ikke er åpnet for petroleumsvirksomhet,» sier hun.
target: “New surveys also indicate significant opportunities in areas that are not open for petroleum activities,” she concludes.

source: Boreprogrammet for brønn 7324/2-1 gjeld boring av ein undersøkingsbrønn i utvinningsløyve 615.
target: The drilling program for well 7324/2-1 relates to the drilling of a wildcat well in production licence 615.

source: Brønnen har gitt verdifull informasjon om området, og en evaluering av brønndataene vil bli utført for å kartlegge det videre ressurspotensialet.
target: The well gives valuable information about the area, and an evaluation of the implication of the well results on the resource potential will be carried out over the coming months.

source: Vanndybden i området er rundt 370 meter og reservoaret ligger rundt 4250 meter ned i undergrunnen.
target: Water depth in the area is around 370 metres and the reservoir is located at a depth of around 4250 metres.

source: Operatørens ressursanslag for funnet før brønn 16/1-13 ble boret var på 15 millioner Sm3 utvinnbare oljeekvivalenter.
target: The operator's estimate of resources in the discovery, prior to the drilling of well 16/1-13, was 15 million Sm3 recoverable oil equivalents.

source: Før de siste brønnene ble boret var ressursanslaget for Dagny på mellom 15 og 50 millioner standard kubikkmeter (Sm3) utvinnbare oljeekvivalenter.
target: Before the last wells were drilled, the resource estimate for Dagny was between 15 and 50 million standard cubic metres (Sm3) of recoverable oil equivalents.

source: Brønnen blir bora om lag 10 kilometer nordaust for olje- og gass/kondensatfeltet Tyrihans på Haltenbanken.
target: The well will be drilled about 10 kilometres northeast of the Tyrihans oil and gas/condensate field on Haltenbanken.

source: West Alpha borer for tiden brønn 6406/3-7 for Statoil i Norskehavet.
target: West Alpha is currently drilling well 6406/3-7 for Statoil i the Norwegian Sea.

target: The well was drilled to a vertical depth of 2082 metres below sea level and was terminated in the Brent group in reservoir rocks from the Middle Jurassic.

source: Havdypet er 1345 meter.
target: The water depth at the site is 1345 metres.

source: ”Det er fortsatt mye å hente fra krittfeltene både på norsk og dansk sokkel.
target: ”There is still a lot to recover from the chalk fields both on the Norwegian and Danish shelves.

source: Brønnen påtraff en sju meter oljekolonne i Draupneformasjonen som har en total tykkelse på 35 meter med god til meget god reservoarkvalitet.
target: The well encountered a seven-metre oil column in the Draupne formation with a total thickness of 35 metres, with good to very good reservoir quality.

source: På denne tida var Nord-Europa og hele kontinentalsokkelen utenfor et sammenhengende lavtliggende sletteland der bare enkelte lave åser stakk opp.
target: When the bit finally penetrated to the basement rock, hopes of finding coal measures in the solid sediments evaporated.

source: Tema: Lagring og bruk av co2
target: Topics: Storage and use of CO2

source: Kompressoren ble satt i produksjon den 16. oktober 2015 og er den første av sitt slag i verden.
target: Operational from 6 October 2015, the compressor is the first of its kind in the world.

source: Høsten 2006 var OD i møte med Fiskeridirektoratet, og i andre halvdel av februar var representanter fra OD i møter med Norges Fiskarlag og Norges Kystfiskerlag for å finne den gunstigste perioden for innsamling.
target: In the fall of 2006, the NPD met with the Directorate of Fisheries, and in the last half of February, NPD representatives met with the Norwegian Fishermen's Association and the Norwegian Coastal Fishermen's Association to determine the most favourable period for data acquisition.

source: Det oppdaterte kartet over det nordlige Barentshavet viser et spennende landskap som består av bassenger, plattformer og høyder.
target: The updated map of the northern Barents Sea shows an exciting landscape that consists of basins, platforms and highs.

source: 2D-seismikk (todimensjonal seismikk) samles inn ved hjelp av en lang lyttekabel som slepes etter det seismiske fartøyet.
target: 2D seismic (two-dimensional seismic) is acquired using a long listening cable towed behind the seismic vessel.

source: Hensikten med brønnen var å påvise petroleum i reservoarbergarter i midtre jura (Hugin- og Sleipnerformasjonen) og øvre trias (Skagerrakformasjonen).
target: The objective of the well was to prove petroleum in the reservoir rocks in the Middle Jurassic (the Hugin and Sleipner formations) and Upper Triassic (the Skagerrak formation).

source: 3D-seismiske undersøkelser benyttes for å kartlegge undergrunnen.
target: 3D-seismic surveys are used to map the subsurface.

source: Brønnen blir bora om lag 330 kilometer vest for Bodø.
target: The well will be drilled about 330 kilometres west of Bodø.

target: In the opened part of the Barents Sea and the northern Barents Sea, the expected figure for undiscovered resources is 960 million Sm3 o.e.

source: App-en ble utviklet for Windows Phone 7.5.
target: The app was developed for Windows Phone 7.5.

target: The oil is transported by pipeline (EGOP) to the Grane oil pipeline and on to the Sture terminal north of Bergen.

source: Draupne- og Huginformasjonene har spor av olje.
target: The Draupne and Hugin formations have traces of oil.

target: The well was drilled to a vertical depth of 1992 metres below the sea surface and terminated in the Klappmyss formation in the Early Triassic.

target: The well was drilled on a prospect in the Paleocene (Early Tertiary) Age called Kneler.

source: Havdypet er 109 meter.

source: Så langt i 2006 er den totale produksjonen om lag 204,8 millioner Sm3 o.e.
target: So far this year the total production is about 204.8 million Sm3 o.e.

source: Utprøving av havbunnsinstallasjoner på feltene Draugen, Troll, Tordis og Tyrihans i perioden 1994 til 2009 har vært viktige steg fram mot denne banebrytende teknologien.
target: Testing of subsea installations on Draugen, Troll, Tordis and Tyrihans in 1994-2009 were necessary moves towards the realisation of this step-changing technology.

source: De siste årene har hun blant annet hatt utsmykkingsoppdrag for Gosen skole, Universitetet i Stavanger og Stavanger kommune.
target: In recent years she has also had ornamentation assignments for Gosen School, the University of Stavanger and the City of Stavanger.

source: Brønnen blir bora om lag 20 kilometer nord for Ekofiskfeltet.
target: The well will be drilled about 20 kilometres north of the Ekofisk field.

source: Videre arbeid er forventet å redusere usikkerheten i dette estimatet.
target: Further work is expected to reduce the uncertainty of this estimate.

source: Fire av funnene i Nordsjøen er gjort nord for Snorrefeltet i den nordlige delen av Nordsjøen, mens det ble gjort ett funn ved Friggfeltet i den midre delen av Norsjøen.
target: Four of the discoveries in the North Sea were made north of the Snorre field in the northern part of the North Sea, while one discovery was made at the Frigg field in the central part of the North Sea.

source: Brønnen påtraff gass/vann - kontakter i midtre til nedre jura reservoarbergarter og bekreftet dermed en nordlig utstrekning av funnet.
target: The well encountered gas/water contacts in Middle to Lower Jurassic rocks, thus confirming the northerly extent of the discovery.

source: Samarbeidet blir etter hvert utvidet til å inkludere universitetene i Oslo, Bergen og Tromsø, Polarinstituttet og Norges geologiske undersøkelse.
target: The partnership will eventually be expanded to include the universities of Oslo, Bergen and Tromsø, the Norwegian Polar Institute and the Norwegian Geological Survey.

source: Statoil Petroleum AS er operatør med 40 prosent del.
target: Statoil Petroleum AS is the operator with an ownership interest of 40 per cent.

source: Overenskomsten ble lagt fram for Stortinget i St.prp. nr.61 for 1981-1982.
target: The agreement was submitted to the Norwegian Parliament in Storting Proposition No. 61 for 1981-1982.

source: Havdypet er 135 meter.
target: Water depth at the site is 135 metres.

source: For å påvise ytterligere oljevolumer, skal en sidestegsbrønn 8/10-4 B bores ut fra brønn 8/10-4 S inn i Ulaformasjonen i et eget segment lengre sør på strukturen.
target: To prove further oil volumes, a sidetrack well, 8/10-4 B, will be drilled from well 8/10-4 S in the Ula formation in a separate segment further south in the structure.

source: Brønnen ble boret av boreinnretningen Mærsk Guardian som nå skal til Fredrikshavn for å gå i opplag.
target: The well was drilled by the drilling facility Mærsk Guardian, which now will proceed to Fredrikshavn to be laid up.

source: Dette er den første letebrønnen i utvinningstillatelse 228.
target: This is the first exploration well in production licence 228.

source: Rundt ti år seinare, etter grundige undersøkingar, vart det påvist at det verkelig har skjedd eit meteorittnedslag i Hjelmeland kommune i Ryfylke.
target: About ten years later, following thorough surveys, it was proven that a meteorite strike had actually taken place in Hjelmeland Municipality in Ryfylke.

source: Ifølge Brekke er mye av berggrunnen på den nordligste kanten av Barentshavsokkelen erodert bort i tidens løp.
target: According to Brekke, much of the bedrock on the northernmost edge of the Barents Sea shelf has eroded over time.

source: Totalvolumet er 6,3 MSm3 o.e. høgare enn i 2011.
target: The total volume is 6.3 MSm3 o.e. larger than for the same period 2011.

source: Foreløpig beregning av størrelsen på funnet er mellom 6,8 og 12,7 millioner standard kubikkmeter (Sm3) utvinnbare oljeekvivalenter.
target: Preliminary estimates indicate that the size of the discovery is between 6.8 and 12.7 million standard cubic metres (Sm3) of recoverable oil equivalents.

source: Dagens vinner vil få tilsendt et trykk av kunstmotivet på standen som er laget av streetart-kunstneren Martin Whatson.
target: Winners will receive a print of the artwork on the stand, created by street artist Martin Whatson.

source: De nye direktørene kommer alle fra OD.
target: All of the new directors come from the NPD.

target: Norway’s ”new” geological national monument will also receive attention.

source: Endelege produksjonstal vil bli gjort offentleg i begynnelsen av desember 2003.
target: Final figures will be published in the beginning of December 2003.

source: Hensikten med brønnene var å avgrense oljefunnet.
target: The objective of these wells was to delineate the oil discovery.

source: Utbyggingen er gjennomført uten store forsinkelser og kostandsoverskridelser.
target: The development was completed without major delays and cost overruns.

source: Av og til er det ising i vinterhalvåret, men det er ingen fare for havis ved dagens klima.
target: Icing may occur during the winter months, but with the current climate there is no danger of sea ice.

target: Water depth at the site is 304 metres.

target: The primary exploration target for the well was to prove petroleum in Jurassic and Triassic reservoir rocks (Realgrunnen subgroup and Snadd formation).

source: Testen bekreftet meget gode reservoaregenskaper og god lateral kontinuitet i konglomeratreservoarene.
target: The test confirmed very good reservoir properties and good lateral continuity in the conglomerate reservoirs.

source: ”Vi ønsker å gi honnør til fagfolkene som har bidratt til å gjøre gassinjeksjonen på Oseberg til en suksesshistorie.
target: “We want to give credit to the experts who have contributed to making gas injection on Oseberg a success story.

source: StatoilHydro Petroleum AS er operatør med 34,0 prosent eierandel.
target: StatoilHydro Petroleum AS is the operator with a 34.0 per cent ownership interest.

source: Om lag 40 prosent av produksjonen på norsk sokkel kommer i dag fra havbunnskompletterte brønner (havbunnsbrønner).
target: Approximately 40 % of the production from the shelf derives from subsea completed wells.

source: Brønnen påtraff også en 20 meter tjukk gass-/kondensatkolonne i Farsundformasjonen, i to soner på fem meter tjukke reservoarbergarter med moderat/god reservoarkvalitet, som bekreftet trykkforbindelse med funnet 2/4-21 King Lear.
target: In addition, the well encountered a 20-metre thick gas/condensate column in the Farsund formation, in two zones of five metre thick reservoir rocks with moderate/good reservoir quality, which confirmed pressure communication with the 2/4-21 King Lear discovery.

source: Ho held fram at det trengst meir data for å få betre kunnskap om området.
target: She maintains that more data is needed to improve the available knowledge about the area.

source: Utvinningsløyve 542 vart delt ut 19.2.2009 (TFO 2010).
target: Production licence 542 was awarded on 19 February 2009 (APA 2010).

source: Kampanjen forsetter med samme boreinnretning i samme utvinningstillatelse, med undersøkelsesbrønn 30/11-12 S og eventuelt 30/11-12 A dersom det er behov for en avgrensningsbrønn i strukturen.
target: The campaign will continue with the same drilling facility in the same production licence, with wildcat well 30/11-12 S and potentially 30/11-12 A if the structure warrants an appraisal well.

source: Brønnen ble boret til et vertikalt dyp på 2702 meter under havoverflaten, og den ble avsluttet i Åsgardformasjonen i undre kritt.
target: The well was drilled to a vertical depth of 2702 metres below the sea surface, and was terminated in the Åsgard formation in the Lower Cretaceous.

source: Fram 2014/15-ekspedisjonen var i gang.
target: The 2014/15 Fram expedition was under way.

source: Avgrensningsbrønn 16/1-18 ble boret til et vertikalt dyp på 2361 meter under havflaten og avsluttet i granittisk grunnfjell.
target: Appraisal well 16/1-18 was drilled to a vertical depth of 2361 metres below the sea surface and terminated in granite basement.

source: Innsamlingen av seismikk i området Nordland IV og V startet 10. juli, og arbeidet skal etter planen pågå i en måned.
target: The seismic acquisition activity in the Nordland IV and V area started on 10 July, and the work is scheduled to last one month.

source: Fase 2 inkluderer også Snadd Outer i PL212E som har samme eiere.
target: Phase 2 also includes Snadd Outer in PL212E, which has the same owners.

source: Brønn 30/11-10 A ble boret innenfor utvinningstillatelse 035 på kostnadsdeling med utvinningstillatelse 272, som har samme rettighetshavere og -andeler som tillatelse 035.
target: Well 30/11-10 A was drilled within production licence 035 on cost-sharing with production licence 272, which has the same licensees and ownership interests as licence 035.

source: Les mer om ODs Co2-lagringsatlas >>
target: Learn more about the NPD's CO2 storage atlas >>

target: The area in this licence consists of a part of block 15/2 and parts of blocks 15/3, 15/5, 15/6 and 15/8.

source: Rettighetshaverne vil vurdere en videre utvikling av dette området av feltet med en tilknytning til den sørligste bunnrammen på feltet.
target: The licensees will consider further expansion of this area of the field with a tie-in to the southernmost subsea template on the field.

source: Fram til hausten 2009 skal ei rekke statlege fagmyndigheiter lage oppskrifter på ulike verkemiddel og tiltak.
target: Up to the fall of 2009, a number of expert government authorities will be drawing up recipes for various policy instruments and measures.

source: Vurderinga vil vere basert på arbeidet OD sjølv gjer i forhold til lagring av CO2.
target: The appraisal will be based on work done by the NPD concerning CO2 storage.

source: Ifølge FN lever om lag 50 prosent av befolkningen under fattigdomsgrensen.
target: According to the UN, about 50 per cent of the population lives below the poverty level.

source: Funnet vil bli produsert fra en senere utvinningsbrønn fra Gullfaks C-plattformen.
target: The discovery will be produced from a subsequent development well from the Gullfaks C platform.

source: I 2004 ble OD delt i to: Oljedirektoratet og Petroleumstilsynet.
target: The NPD was divided into two entities in 2004: the Norwegian Petroleum Directorate and the Petroleum Safety Authority Norway.

source: Brønnen skulle testprodusere i ett år.
target: The well was supposed to do test production for one year.

source: Brønn 34/8-14 D ble boret til et vertikalt dyp på 2941 meter under havoverflaten og avsluttet i Dunlingruppen i nedre jura.
target: Well 34/8-14 D was drilled to a vertical depth of 2941 metres below the sea surface and was concluded in the Dunlin Group in the Lower Jurassic.

source: Det totale gass salet var 10,9 milliardar standard kubikkmeter (GSm3), dette er 0,9 GSm3 meir enn månaden før.
target: Total gas sales were about 10.9 billion Sm3, which is 0.9 GSm3 more than previous month.

source: Vi må ha beredskapen i orden, tenke på seilingsleder og utvikle standarder for skipstrafikk som er allment akseptert.
target: We must maintain our emergency response, think about sailing channels and develop generally-accepted standards for maritime traffic.

source: Dette kan gi store gevinster, men det krever et utstrakt samarbeid oljeselskapene mellom og med myndigheter for å kvalifisere og prøve ut nye teknologier ute på feltene.
target: This can result in significant gains, but it will require extensive cooperation both among the oil companies and with the authorities in order to qualify and test new technologies on the fields.

source: Den andre rettshavaren er Petoro AS med 30 prosent og ExxonMobil Exploration & Production Norway AS med 13 prosent.
target: The other licensees are Petoro AS with 30 per cent and ExxonMobil & Production Norway AS with 13 per cent.

source: Som forventet var reservoarkvaliteten meget god.
target: As expected, the reservoir quality was very good.

target: Total E&P Norge AS 40% AS (operator)

source: Væskeproduksjonen i desember fordeler seg slik: 1 634 000 fat olje, 278 000 fat NGL og 79 000 fat kondensat i gjennomsnitt per dag.
target: The average daily liquid production in December was: 1 634 000 barrels of oil, 278 000 barrels of NGL and 79 000 barrels of condensate.

source: Det er utført omfattende datainnsamling og prøvetaking samt en vellykket formasjonstest.
target: Extensive data collection and sampling have been carried out, as well as a successful formation test.

source: For å få det til, må det letes mer.
target: But exploration activity has to be increased.

source: Brønn 15/12-18S hadde to boremål, ett i paleocen (Storskrymten-prospektet) og ett i jura/trias (Grytkollen-prospektet).
target: Well 15/12-18S had two drilling targets, one in the Paleocene (the Storskrymten prospect) and one in the Jurassic/Triassic (the Grytkollen prospect).

source: Konsesjonsreglene la opp til langsiktighet og at man skulle «skynde seg langsomt».
target: The licensing rules established a long-term perspective and the concept of "hurry up slowly".

source: Brønnene ble boret av boreinnretningen Island Innovator som nå skal bore avgrensingsbrønn 7220/11-3 på samme funn og i samme utvinningstillatelse.
target: The wells were drilled by the Island Innovator drilling facility, which will now drill appraisal well 7220/11-3 on the same discovery and in the same production licence.

source: Brønnen ble boret på "Snøhetta "-prospektet i blokk 6609 på Nordlandsryggen om lag 100 km nordvest av Nornefeltet.
target: The well was drilled on the "Snøhetta" prospect in block 6609 on Nordlandsryggen, about 100 km north-west of the Norne field .

source: Det totale gassalet var 10,2 milliardar standard kubikkmeter (GSm3), dette er 0,3 GSm3 mindre enn månaden før.
target: Total gas sales were about 10.2 billion Sm3, which is 0.3 GSm3 less than the previous month.

source: Eitt av spørsmåla har vore om ein like gjerne kunne ha injisert vatn som vert produsert frå reservoaret saman med olja.
target: One of the questions regards whether it would be possible to inject produced water from the reservoir together with the oil.

source: Utvinningstillatelse 169 ble tildelt 13.konsesjonsrunde i 1991.
target: Production license 169 was awarded in the 13th licensing round in 1991.

source: Jan-Juli 2006
target: Jan-July 2006

source: Disse dataene har også stor vitenskapelig verdi og har vært grunnlaget for flere hovedfagsoppgaver i geologi/geofysikk ved unversitetetene i Bergen og Oslo.
target: This data has great scientific value as well and has been the basis of several post-graduate theses in geology/geophysics at the universities of Bergen and Oslo.

source: OD beskrives som leveransedyktig og serviceinnstilt, og samarbeidet karakteriseres som svært godt.
target: The NPD is described as being able to deliver and service-minded, and the cooperation is characterised as very good.

source: Kontaktperson i OD: Rune Hult tlf.
target: Contact in the NPD: Rune Hult, tel.

target: One of the two pipes that currently transport the gas from Tune to Oseberg will be reused to transport gas for injection from Oseberg to Delta.

source: De tre etatene har på oppdrag fra Miljøverndepartementet og Olje- og energidepartementet vurdert behovet for nye krav til utslipp til sjø fra petroleumsvirksomheten i Nordsjøen og Norskehavet.
target: On assignment from the Ministry of the Environment and the Ministry of Petroleum and Energy, the three agencies have considered the need for new requirements for discharges to sea from the petroleum activities in the North Sea and the Norwegian Sea.

source: Brønn 16/4-5 ble boret med den halvt nedsenkbare boreinnretningen Transocean Winner, som nå skal til utvinningstillatelse 316 DS i Nordsjøen for å bore undersøkelsesbrønn 9/2-11 der Talisman Energy Norge AS er operatør.
target: Well 16/4-5 was drilled with the semi-submersible drilling facility Transocean Winner, which will now proceed to production licence 316 DS in the North Sea to drill wildcat well 9/2-11, where Talisman Energy Norge AS is the operator.

source: Ved årsskiftet var det 77 funn på norsk sokkel som nå blir vurdert bygd ut.
target: At the turn of the year, there were 77 discoveries on the Norwegian shelf that are being considered for development.

target: The well was drilled by the Songa Trym drilling facility, which will now proceed to production licence 128 in the Norwegian Sea to drill appraisal well 6608/11-8 where Statoil is the operator.

source: Løyvet føreset at andre løyve og samtykkje som blir kravde av andre myndigheiter er gitt før boringa startar.

source: Omfattende datainnsamling og prøvetaking ble utført, inkludert en vellykket formasjonstest i Cookformasjonen.
target: Extensive data acquisition and sampling were carried out, including a successful formation test in the Cook formation.

target: The discovery was made in 2011 in connection with the drilling of well 8/10-4 S.

target: The drilling programme for well 7130/4-1 relates to the drilling of an exploration well in production licence 708 where Lundin Norway AS is the operator with an ownership interest of 40 per cent.

target: The acreage in this permit consists of the two blocks 6408/7 and – 8, which are located about 45 km northwest of the Njord field in southern part of the Norwegian Sea.

source: Oljedirektoratet ser tendenser til at selskaper prioriterer å investere minst mulig i utbyggingsfasen, noe som kan legge begrensinger på eller fordyre senere oppgraderinger av anleggene.
target: The NPD has noted tendencies where companies prioritise minimum investment in the development phase, but that could limit subsequent upgrades of the facilities, or make them more expensive.

source: Havdypet er 384 meter.
target: Water depth at the site is 384 metres and the wells will now be permanently plugged and abandoned.

target: Wellbore 7324/9-1 will be drilled from the Transocean Spitsbergen drilling facility at position 73° 19' 29.28'' north and 24° 50' 24.24'' east.

source: Dette vil sannsynligvis bli en stor, selvstendig utbygging.

source: Felteierne, ved operatør, berømmes for risikovilje og beslutningsevne.
target: The owners of the field, led by the operator, deserve praise for their willingness to take risks and ability to make decisions.

target: The other licensee is Bayerngas Norway AS (50 per cent).

source: Der sprekkene var åpne, ble det påvist spor av olje.
target: Traces of oil were proved where the joints were open.

target: The primary exploration target for the 16/1-16 wildcat well was to prove petroleum in Lower Cretaceous and Upper Jurassic reservoir rocks (Åsgard and Draupne formations) on the west side of the Utsira High.

target: The seismic data acquisition was carried out in a defined section (approx. 15 x 85 km) of the area outside Vesterålen known as Nordland VII.

target: Final production figures for April 2012 show an average daily production of about 1.646 million barrels of oil, 0.413 million barrels of NGL and condensate, and a total of 9.4 billion Sm3 saleable gas production.

source: Endelege produksjonstal er klare i første halvdel av mai 2009.
target: Final figures will be available in the beginning of May 2009.

target: Wildcat well 7222/6-1 S was drilled to a total depth of 2825 metres below the sea surface and was completed in rocks from the Early Triassic period.

target: The 35/9-7 oil discovery was proven in 2012 in Upper Jurassic reservoir rocks («intra Heather sandstones») about 16 kilometres southwest of the Gjøa field in the northeastern part of the North Sea.

target: The largest operational discharges from oil and gas production offshore are now linked to produced water, which contains small amounts of naturally occurring substances and radioactive substances that leak out of the bedrock.

target: Several planned wells should have been drilled, not least with a view towards phasing in any finds towards vacant capacity in existing infrastructure.

target: Well 16/2-19 will be drilled from the Ocean Vanguard drilling facility at position 58°54’12.3” north and 2°29’37.8” east in production licence 265 in the central part of the North Sea.

source: Det var ingen lett oppgave for noen av partene, og særlig ikke for britene, som hadde godtatt midtlinjeprinsippet på tross av at havretten kunne gitt dem rettigheter til Norskerenna gitt ett annet utfall på grensesettingen.
target: It was not an easy task for anyone, particularly the Brits, who had accepted the median line principle despite the fact that the law of the sea could have given them the rights to the Norwegian Trench, given a different outcome for the boundary setting.

source: «OD forventer at realiseringen av ressursene i Utgard vil bidra til å skape verdier både for det norske samfunnet og for rettighetshaverne i Utgard og Sleipner,» sier Francke.

target: The seismic data acquisition in the area was originally scheduled to start on 24 June, but was postponed due to a fire in the engine room on board the seismic vessel Atlantic Explorer, which was to carry out the acquisition of seismic data.

target: 20 per cent

source: Smithbank- og Huginformasjonen er vannførende slik at brønnene er klassifiserte som tørre.
target: The Smith Bank and Hugin formation are aquiferous, and the wells have accordingly been classified as dry.

source: 31. august i fjor ble Sabvaaba og de to forskerne satt av på isen rett ved Nordpolen av den tyske forskningsisbryteren Polarstern.
target: On 31 August last year, Sabvaaba and the two researchers were placed on the ice near the North Pole by the German research ice breaker Polarstern.

source: Denne posten er budsjettert til 3,1 millioner kroner neste år, det er en videreføring av saldert budsjett 2012.
target: This item is budgeted at NOK 3.1 million for next year, which is a continuation of the final budget for 2012.

source: Jette feltet fikk godkjent PUD i februar i år.
target: The PDO for Jette was approved in February 2012.

source: Arealet i dette løyvet består av 318,732 km2 av blokk 7219/12 og 318,732 km2 av blokk 7220/10.
target: The area in this licence consists of 318 732 km2 of block 7219/12 and 318 732 km2 of block 7220/10.

source: Så langt i 2006 er den totale produksjonen om lag 106,8 millioner Sm3 o.e.
target: So far this year the total production is about 106.8 million Sm3 o.e.

source: Brønnen er boret om lag 20 kilometer sørøst for Åsgardfeltet og 10 kilometer nordvest for Tyrihansfeltet i Norskehavet.
target: The well was drilled about 20 kilometres southeast of the Åsgard field and 10 kilometres northwest of the Tyrihans field in the Norwegian Sea.

source: Tre avgrensningsbrønner 15/9-B-8, -8A og -8D ble boret om lag to kilometer nord for funnbrønnen.
target: Three appraisal wells, 15/9-B-8, -8A and -8D, were drilled about two kilometres north of the discovery well.

source: Disse bidrar med inntil 2 millioner danske kroner i året hver fra 2012, i første omgang i tre år.
target: They are each contributing up to DKK two million annually starting from 2012, initially for a period of three years.

source: Øvrige rettighetshavere er Petoro AS med 30 prosent, ExxonMobil 10,5 prosent), Idemitsu (9,6 prosent), Total (5,6 prosent) og RWE-Dea (2,8 prosent).
target: The other licensees are Petoro AS (30 per cent), ExxonMobil (10.5 per cent), Idemitsu (9.6 per cent), Total (5.6 per cent) and RWE Dea (2.8 per cent).

source: Brønnene er boret om lag 30 kilometer nordøst for Visundfeltet i den nordlige delen av Nordsjøen og rundt 185 kilometer nordvest for Bergen.
target: The wells were drilled about 30 kilometres northeast of the Visund field in the northern part of the North Sea, and about 185 kilometres northwest of Bergen.

source: Det er en økning på 58 millioner Sm3 o.e . i forhold til sist rapportering.
target: This is an increase of 58 million Sm3 o.e. compared with the previous reporting.

source: Hinderaker har flere ganger vært sentral i myndighetenes behandling av prosjekter for økt utvinning, blant annet Ekofisk vanninjeksjon (1983) og Oseberg gassinjeksjon (1986).
target: Hinderaker has on numerous occasions played a central part in the authorities’ processing of projects for improved recovery rates, including the Ekofisk water injection project (1983) and Oseberg gas injection (1986).

source: Lisensen ble tildelt 4. februar 2011 (TFO 2010).

target: The objective of appraisal well 6406/9-2 was to delimit the discovery.

source: Feltet er bygget ut med en fjernstyrt brønnhodeinnretning uten prosessutstyr.
target: The field was developed with a remote-controlled wellhead facility without process equipment.

source: BP Norge AS er operatør med ein del på 30 prosent.
target: BP Norge AS is operator with a 30 per cent ownership interest.

target: Phone/ E-mail

target: Appraisal well 16/5-4 was drilled to a vertical depth of 2075 metres below the sea surface and was terminated in Triassic rocks.

target: The other licensees are Det norske (30 per cent) and Petoro (30 per cent).

target: Production licence 518 was awarded in APA 2008 (23 October 2009).

target: Expected investments are NOK 15.7 billion for Njord and NOK 4.1 billion for Bauge.

target: Eni Norge AS is the operator with an ownership interest of 40 per cent.

target: Jan-June 2005

source: Foreløpige beregninger av størrelsen på funnet er mellom 0,4 og 1,5 millioner standard kubikkmeter (Sm3) utvinnbare oljeekvivalenter (o.e.).
target: Preliminary calculations of the size of the discovery are between 0.4 and 1.5 million standard cubic metres (Sm3) of recoverable oil equivalents (o.e.).

target: Actual production so far this year shows that we are running 0.4 percent ahead of the forecast.

target: For example, we had a two-day seminar on biostratigraphy that was very well-attended.

target: The geological mapping started last summer and will continue this summer.

source: Det er tidligere boret i alt 16 brønner i blokken.
target: Altogether 16 wells have previously been drilled in this block.

target: The well encountered a gross oil column of 30+ metres in the Hugin formation.

source: Den regelen gjaldt da vi begynte å bygge ut norsk sokkel.
target: This rule was in effect when we started developing the Norwegian shelf.

source: Av dette utgjorde oljeproduksjonen rundt 102,2 millionar Sm3 o.e., kondensat og NGL rundt 11,4 millionar Sm3 o.e., og gass for sal rundt 37,9 millionar Sm3 o.e.
target: Oil production approx. 102.2 million Sm3 o.e., condensate and NGL about 11.4 million Sm3 o.e., and marketable gas about 37.9 million Sm3 o.e.

source: Tallet er ventet å stige ytterligere i årene framover.
target: This figure is expected to rise in coming years.

source: Brønnen er boret om lag 18 kilometer sørøst for Skarvfeltet i Norskehavet.
target: The well has been drilled about 18 kilometres southeast of the Skarv field in the Norwegian Sea.

source: svekkelse og kompaksjon av krittbergarten ved injeksjon av vann og/eller CO2
target: weakening and compaction of chalk rocks when injecting water and/or CO2

source: Det totale gassalet var 9,4 milliardar standard kubikkmeter (GSm3), dette er 1,6 GSm3 meir enn månaden før.
target: Total gas sales were about 9.4 billion Sm3, which is 1,6 GSm3 more than the previous month.

source: Det er gjort fleire store funn i Barentshavet og Nordsjøen i år.
target: A number of major discoveries were made in the Barents Sea and the North Sea this year.

source: Investeringene for begge har blitt lavere enn forutsatt i PAD.
target: Investments for both have been lower than projected in the PIO.

source: Og er framtidsutsiktene til olje- og gassnæringen så dystre som det presenteres fra regjerningshold?
target: And is the outlook for the oil and gas sector as bleak as it has been painted by members of the Norwegian government?

source: Tiljeformasjonen er vannførende.
target: The Tilje formation is water-bearing.

source: De to transportsystemene er levert i henhold til tidsplanen.
target: The two transport systems have both been delivered according to schedule.

source: Brønnen ble boret til et vertikalt dyp av 2600 meter under havflaten, og ble avsluttet i Skagerrakformasjonen i trias.
target: The well was drilled to a vertical depth of 2600 metres below the sea surface, and was terminated in the Skagerrak formation in Triassic.

source: Vi gler oss til å ta fatt på denne jobben,» seier leitedirektør Sissel Eriksen.
target: We are looking forward to tackling this job,” says exploration director Sissel Eriksen.

source: Brønnen ble boret av boreinnretningen Bideford Dolphin fra en havbunnsramme på Vigdis nordøst.
target: The well was drilled by the Bideford Dolphin drilling facility from a subsea template on Vigdis northeast.

target: (Photo: Jan Høst)

source: Hensikten med brønn 35/9-8 var å avgrense funnet.
target: The objective of well 35/9-8 was to delineate the discovery.

target: The area in this licence consists of parts of blocks 16/5 and 16/6, as well as blocks 16/8 and 16/9.

source: Hensikten med avgrensningsbrønn 16/2-17 S var å undersøke reservoaregenskapene og tykkelsen samt oljekolonnen i reservoarsonene i jura i en posisjon nær den vestlige hovedforkastningen som avgrenser Johan Sverdrup.
target: The objective of appraisal well 16/2-17 S was to investigate the reservoir properties and thickness, as well as the oil column in the reservoir zones in the Jurassic in a position near the western main fault that delimits Johan Sverdrup.

source: Olje/vann-kontakten ble ikke påtruffet, men trykkmålinger tyder på at det er sammenheng mellom dette segmentet og resten av Johan Sverdrupfunnet.
target: The oil/water contact was not encountered, but pressure measurements indicate a connection between this segment and the rest of the Johan Sverdrup discovery.

source: Hvis du er interessert i et spesielt område bruk "+"-knappen i verktøymenyen øverst til høyre.
target: If you are interested in a particular area use the "+" button in the tools map on the top right corner.

source: Tomas Mørch, Nordsjøen nord
target: Tomas Mørch, North Sea North

source: Dei andre rettshavarane er VNG Norge AS (30 prosent) og Skagen 44 AS (10 prosent).
target: The other licensees are VNG Norge AS (30 per cent) and Skagen 44 AS (10 per cent).

source: Hensikten med brønnene 6507/6-4 S og 6507/6-4 A var å påvise petroleum i henholdsvis øvre trias (”Grey Beds”) og i permiske reservoarbergarter (tilsvarende Foldvik Creekgruppen på Østgrønland).
target: The objective of wells 6507/6-4 S and 6507/6-4 A was to prove petroleum in Upper Triassic (”Grey Beds”) and Permian reservoir rocks (corresponding to the Foldvik Creek Group in East Greenland), respectively.

source: (Illustrasjon: Statoil)
target: (Illustration: Statoil)

source: Arealet i denne tillatelsen består av en del av blokk 34/4, med nordlig del av Snorrefeltet i Nordsjøen.
target: The area in this licence is comprised of a part of block 34/4, with the northern part of the Snorre field in the North Sea.

source: Fra 2005 til 2009 var han prosjektleder for et Forskningsrådsprosjekt for analyse av 4-dimensjonale seismikkdata (PETROMAKS).
target: From 2005 to 2009, he was the project leader for a Research Council of Norway project for analysis for four-dimensional seismic data (PETROMAKS).

source: I april starta produksjonen frå fire nye felt på norsk sokkel; Gaupe, Marulk, Islay og Oselvar.
target: In April, the Gaupe, Marulk, Islay and Oselvar fields started production on the Norwegian Shelf.

source: I MITs studie blir derfor CO2-fangst- og lagringsteknologi nøkkelen til at verdens økende energibehov kan møtes uten økte CO2-utslipp.
target: As a result, the MIT study concludes that CCS solutions are crucial for meeting higher global energy demand without releasing more greenhouse gases.

source: I løpet av 2007 blir resultatet av den nye politikken synlig for fullt.
target: “The results of the new policy will become fully visible during 2007.

source: Les også om Tomas Mørch, som har fulgt opp Snorre-feltet i 25 år – med mål om å utvinne store mengder ekstra olje.
target: Read also about Tomas Mørch, the NPD staffer who has been monitoring the Snorre field for 25 years to ensure that large quantities of additional oil are recovered.

source: Pengene brukes til administrasjon og fellesaktiviteter,» sier Eva Halland, som er geolog i OD og leder for Force-sekretariatet.
target: The funds are spent on administration and joint activities,” says Eva Halland, who is an NPD geologist and chair of the Force secretariat.

source: Rettshavarar er Total (51 prosent), Petoro (30 prosent) og Statoil (19 prosent).
target: The licensees are Total (51 per cent), Petoro (30 per cent) and Statoil (19 per cent).

source: Begge brønnene ble avsluttet i Rannochformasjonen i midtre jura.
target: Both wells were terminated in the Rannoch formation in the Middle Jurassic.

source: De kan ikke kopiere oss, men det kan likevel være flere historiske faktorer fra vår måte å organisere virksomheten på som kan være nyttige for dem, påpeker statsråden og trekker fram et eksempel:
target: They can’t copy us, but a number of historical aspects of the way we organise the business could still be useful to them.”

source: Arbeidsprogrammet knyttet til tildelinger i modne områder er skreddersydd for å kunne medføreraske beslutninger om utbygginger.
target: The work programs associated with awards in mature areas are tailored to facilitate rapid decisions and developments.

source: Hensikten med brønnen var å påvise petroleum i reservoarbergarter i nedre jura (Åreformasjonen).
target: The purpose of the well was to prove petroleum in reservoir rocks from the Lower Jurassic (the Åre formation).

source: Reservoarkvaliteten var dårligere enn forventet, og foreløpige beregninger viser at funnet ikke er økonomisk interessant.
target: The reservoir quality was poorer than expected, and preliminary calculations show that the discovery is not commercially interesting.

source: Primært letemål for brønnen var å påvise petroleum i øvre jura reservoarbergarter («intra Draupne sandstein»).
target: The primary exploration target for the well was to prove petroleum in Upper Jurassic reservoir rocks (“intra Draupne sandstone”).

source: Dette er den andre undersøkingsbrønnen som vert bora i løyvet, men det er bora undersøkingsbrønnar tidlegare innanfor det arealet dette løyvet dekker.
target: This is the second wildcat well to be drilled in the licence, but wildcat wells have previously been drilled within the area covered by this licence.

source: Årets konferanse arrangeres i Doha i Qatar i perioden 4.– 8.desember.
target: This year’s congress will be held in Doha, Qatar during the period 4 – 8 December.

source: Det Norske Oljeselskap AS, Statoil ASA og Eni Norge AS er rettighetshavere i tillatelsen.
target: The licensees in the permit are Det Norske Oljeselskap AS, Statoil ASA and Eni Norge AS.

source: Undergrunnsmiljøet på Oseberg består av 70 mennesker fordelt på fem ulike avdelinger, opplyser Eek-Jensen.
target: The subsurface environment on Oseberg consists of 70 people distributed over five different departments, according to Eek-Jensen.

source: Foreløpig beregning av størrelsen på funnet er mellom 5 og 18 milliarder standard kubikkmeter (Sm3)utvinnbar gass.
target: Preliminary estimates place the size of the discovery between 5 and 18 billion standard cubic metres (Sm3) of recoverable gas.

source: Samordnet utbygging av flere funn er ikke nødvendigvis noe oljeselskapene ønsker, og det kan føre til interessekonflikter.
target: Unitised development of several discoveries is not necessarily something the oil companies want, and it can lead to a conflict of interests.

source: Hensikten med brønnen var å påvise petroleum i øvre kritt reservoarbergarter.
target: The purpose of the well was to prove petroleum in Upper Cretaceous reservoir rocks.

source: Antallet påbegynte letebrønner var det tredje høyeste noensinne.
target: The number of spudded exploration wells was the third highest ever recorded.

source: Brønnen bekrefter Oljedirektoratets vurderinger om at det fortsatt kan gjøres funn som er lønnsomme i godt utforskete deler av norsk sokkel
target: The well confirms the Norwegian Petroleum Directorate's opinion that commercial discoveries can still be made in the thoroughly explored parts of the Norwegian shelf.

source: Samarbeidsprosjektet mellom Norge og Russland, "Geologisk utvikling av petroleumsprovinsene i Barentshavet, Karahavet og Pechorabassenget", vil kunne bidra til å gi noen av svarene.
target: A Russo-Norwegian project on the geological development of petroleum provinces in the Barents and Kara Seas and in the Pechora Basin could help to provide some of the answers.

source: Boreprogrammet for brønnbane 17/12-4 B gjelder boring av avgrensingsbrønn i utvinningstillatelse 407.
target: The drilling program for wellbore 17/12-4 B relates to the drilling of an appraisal well in production licence 407.

source: Utenriksminister Jonas Gahr Støre sier i en kommentar at det er gledelig at Norges kandidat ble gjenvalgt til Kontinentalsokkelkommisjonen i New York.
target: Minister of Foreign Affairs Jonas Gahr Støre commented that it was gratifying that Norway's candidate was re-elected to the Continental Shelf Commission in New York.

source: Endelege produksjonstal for oktober 2011 syner ein gjennomsnittleg dagsproduksjon på om lag 1,661 millionar fat olje, 0,378 millionar fat NGL og kondensat og totalt 8,2 GSm3 gass.
target: Final production figures from October 2011 show an average daily production of about 1.661 million barrels of oil, 0.378 million barrels of NGL and condensate and a total of 8.2 billion Sm3 net gas production.

source: Det er fem flere enn tilsvarende periode i 2008.
target: This is five more than in the corresponding period in 2008.

source: Vi er glade for at regjeringen vil bevilge mer penger innen dette viktige området, og vi har tro på at et pådriv fra Oljedirektoratet kan bidra til nye prosjekter som vil resultere i økt utvinning og dermed også økt verdiskapning fra felt i drift, sier Arne Holhjem, som er direktør for teknologi, miljø og økt utvinning i Oljedirektoratet.
target: “We are pleased that the government wants to allocate more funds within this important area, and believe that increased efforts by the Norwegian Petroleum Directorate can contribute to new projects that will result in improved recovery and thus also increased value creation from operating fields,” says Arne Holhjem, director for technology, environment and improved recovery in the Norwegian Petroleum Directorate.

source: OMFATTENDE, MEN ENKELT Rapporteringene er derfor omfattende.
target: Extensive The reporting process is accordingly extensive.

source: Total E&P Norge AS er operatør med ein del på 40 prosent.
target: Total E&P Norge AS is the operator with a 40 per cent ownership interest.

source: Brønnen ble formasjonstestet.
target: The well was formation-tested.

source: På 1980-tallet samarbeidet Norge og Island om å få gjort seismiske undersøkelser på hele Jan Mayen-ryggen.
target: In the 1980s, Norway and Iceland cooperated on conducting seismic surveys all across the Jan Mayen Ridge.

target: Download Norwegian Continental Shelf no.1-2015 (pdf and html) >>

source: Brønnene ble boret av boreinnretningen Transocean Arctic, som nå skal bore undersøkelsesbrønn 36/7-4 i utvinningstillatelse 636 i Nordsjøen der ENGIE E&P Norge AS er operatør.
target: The wells were drilled by the Transocean Arctic drilling facility, which will now drill wildcat well 36/7-4 in production licence 636 in the North Sea, where ENGIE E&P Norge AS is the operator.

source: Funnet ble gjort i midtre jura reservoarbergarter (nedre deler av Brentgruppen) og ligger om lag 10km nordøst for Friggfeltet i Nordsjøen.
target: The discovery was made in Middle Jurassic reservoir rocks (lower parts of the Brent Group), and is located approximately 10 kilometres north-east of the Frigg field in the North Sea.

source: Brønnen ble boret av boreinnretningen Leiv Eiriksson, som nå skal bore undersøkelsesbrønn 7220/6-2 R i samme utvinningstillatelse.
target: The well was drilled by the Leiv Eiriksson drilling facility, which will now proceed to drill wildcat well 7220/6-2 R in the same production licence.

source: Brønnen påtraff gass i Knurrformasjonen.
target: The well encountered gas in the Knurr formation.

source: Stortingsmelding nr 26 (2006-2007) sier at nullutslippsmålet for tilsatte kjemikalier er nådd.
target: Storting White Paper No. 26 (2006-2007) says that the zero discharge target for added chemicals has been achieved.

source: Dette er den ellevte leitebrønnen som blir bora innafor løyvet sitt areal, og den femtande på Ivar Aasen-feltet.
target: This is the eleventh exploration well to be drilled within the licence area and the fifteenth well on the Ivar Aasen field.

source: Huginformasjonen har som forventet gode reservoaregenskaper, men er tørr.
target: As expected, the Hugin formation has good reservoir properties, but is dry.

source: Brønnene var tørre, men det ble påvist reservoarutvikling i trias bergarter.
target: The wells were dry, but reservoir development in Triassic rocks was proven.

source: Tabellen under viser felt som ble stengt, og felt som kom i produksjon i 2014, felt under utbygging ved årsskiftet og felt som forventes å starte produksjon i 2015.
target: The table below shows fields that were shut down, and fields that started production in 2014, fields under development at the end of last year and fields that are expected to start production in 2015.

source: Regjeringen har varslet at den vil legge fram en forvaltningsplan for Nordsjøen og Skagerrak i 2013.
target: The Government has indicated that it will submit a comprehensive management plan for the North Sea and Skagerrak in 2013.

source: Boreprogrammet for brønn 7222/1-1 gjeld boring av undersøkelsesbrønn i utvinningsløyve 226.
target: The drilling programme for well 7222/1-1 relates to the drilling of a wildcat well in production licence 226.

source: Maksimum produksjonsrate var på 180 000 Sm3 gass per strømningsdøgn gjennom en 44/64 tommers dyseåpning.
target: The maximum production rate was 180 000 Sm3 gas per flow day through a 44/64-inch nozzle.

source: Nye aktører med nye ideer og nye letemål har gitt flere nye funn i gamle områder.
target: New players with new ideas and new exploration goals have yielded more new discoveries in old areas.

source: Endelige produksjonstall for oktober vil bli offentliggjort i begynnelsen av desember 2005.
target: Final figures will be published in the beginning of December 2005.

source: Formasjonstest ble ikke utført i brønnen, men det er utført omfattende datainnsamling og prøvetaking.
target: No formation test was conducted in the well, but extensive data acquisition and sampling were carried out.

source: Også Noreg, som så langt har levd godt på olje- og gasseksport, har så smått byrja å interessere seg for gasshydrat.
target: Norway, which has so far lived well from oil and gas exports, is also starting to get interested in hydrates.

source: Norsk olje-, NGL og kondensatproduksjon 2006-2008
target: Production of oil, NGL and condensate on the NCS 2006-2008 million bbls per day

target: Some maps are also offered as downloadable GIF or PDF files.

source: Brønnbane 30/6-28 S skal borast frå boreinnretninga COSL Pioneer i posisjon 60°33’59,33” nord og 2°44’40,69” aust etter avslutting av boring av undersøkingsbrønn 33/12-9 S for Statoil Petroleum AS i utvinningsløyve 152.
target: Wellbore 30/6-28 S will be drilled from the COSL Pioneer drilling facility at position 60°33’59.33” north and 2°44’40.69” east after completing the drilling of wildcat well 33/12-9 S for Statoil Petroleum AS in production licence 152.

source: Det samme gjaldt Stortingets industrikomité.
target: So was the standing committee on industry in the Storting (parliament).

source: Den uventede nedgangen i oljeproduksjon i 2012 ble mer enn kompensert av det rekordhøye gassalget, og i kommende femårsperiode vil gass stå for om lag halvparten av petroleumssalget fra sokkelen.
target: The unexpected decline in oil production in 2012 was more than offset by the record-high gas sales, and gas will represent more than half of petroleum sales from the shelf in the next five-year period.

source: Denne brønnen, som også ble også boret fra Murchison-innretningen, var tørr.
target: This well, also drilled from the Murchison facility, was dry.

source: Maksimum produksjonsrate var på 180 000 Sm3 gass per strømningsdøgn gjennom en 16/64 tommers dyseåpning.
target: The maximum production rate was 180 000 Sm3 of gas every 24 hours of flow through a 16/64-inch nozzle.

source: Utvinningstillatelse 281 ble tildelt i 17. konsesjonsrunde.

target: Awards in predefined areas 2013 (APA 2013) - announcement >>

source: Statoil Petroleum AS er operatør med 57 prosent del.
target: Statoil Petroleum AS is the operator with an ownership interest of 57 per cent.

source: Allerede i slutten av 1979, bare fem år etter funnbrønnen, startet produksjonen fra en plattform som opprinnelig skulle stått på Beryl-feltet på britisk side.
target: At the end of 1979, just five years after the discovery well, production started from a platform that was originally intended for the Beryll field on the UK side.

source: Hensikten med sidesteget 34/3-3A var å avgrense 34/3-3 S-funnet ved å bekrefte utbredelse av reservoarbergarter og i tillegg påvise olje i nedre del av Cook-formasjonen.
target: The objective of the 34/3-3A sidetrack was to delineate the 34/3-3 S discovery by confirming the extent of reservoir rocks and also proving oil in the lower part of the Cook formation.

target: Other Information for the application

source: I Barentshavet ble funnene 7220/8-1 ”Skrugard” og 7225/3-1 ”Norvarg” påvist.
target: In the Barents Sea, the 7220/8-1 “Skrugard” and 7225/3-1 “Norvarg” discoveries were proven.

source: Væskeproduksjonen i august fordeler seg slik: 1 558 000 fat olje, 337 000 fat NGL og 33 000 fat kondensat i gjennomsnitt per dag.
target: Average daily liquids production in August was: 1 558 000 barrels of oil, 337 000 barrels of NGL and 33 000 barrels of condensate.

source: Forventet investering er nær 1,9 milliarder kroner (norsk andel).

source: - Vi bruker mye mer tid på boring enn planlagt, sier Mauritzen og peker på en plansje som viser utviklingen i bore- effektiviteten på feltene der ExxonMobil er rettighetshaver.

target: The purpose of these amendments is to encourage the licensees to initiate activity in licences which today are on hold, or to relinquish them to the state in order to give other lisensees a chance.

source: Tvert imot, slike land er ofte korrupte, har flere borgerkriger og styringsproblemer, og de makter ikke å gjøre det som er selve hovedoppgaven: Å omdanne hver eneste dråpe olje som hentes opp fra undergrunnen til veier, helsestell og utdanning, sier han.

source: Sekundært letemål var å påvise petroleum i nedre jura reservoargergarter (Tilje- og Åreformasjonene).

source: Den er midlertidig plugget.

source: Atlaset kommer til å bli brukt av OD i forbindelse med utlysninger og søknader om lagring av CO2.
target: The atlas will be used by the NPD in connection with announcements and applications regarding storage of CO2.

target: Tie-in of the discovery to the Norne field will be considered.

target: Final production figures for May 2012 show an average daily production of about 1.634 million barrels of oil, 0.390 million barrels of NGL and condensate, and a total of 8.9 billion Sm3 saleable gas production.

source: Produsert vann Ved produksjon av olje følger det normalt med vann.
target: Produced water Oil production usually involves production of some water.

target: The well, which proved oil and gas, was drilled in the North Sea, ten kilometres northeast of the Fram field and 85 kilometres southwest of Florø.

target: A new PDO, involving extensive use of new technology and big improvements in costs and expected oil and gas output, was submitted the authorities in the summer of 2005.

source: Og her står vi i dag, og alt tyder på at Statfjord kan komme til å leve til midt på 2020-tallet.

target: This is the ninth exploration well in production licence 265.

target: The reservoir rocks, most likely Late Jurassic, consist of about six metres of sandstone with very good reservoir quality.

target: The drilling activity was conducted in rocks with high temperature and pressure, and provided positive experiences with the use of new technology which may be significant for similar drilling activities in the area.

target: The secondary target was to examine the presence of reservoir rocks in the Triassic (the Hegre Group) and examine reservoir quality in the Cretaceous (the Shetland Group).

target: 19 of the 25 are wildcat wells (new prospects) and six are appraisal wells (for delineation of earlier discoveries).

source: DONG E&P Norge vil så igjen overta Mærsk Guardian for å bore ytterligere en letebrønn på et prospekt kalt Ipswich i nærheten av funn 1/3-6 i utvinningstillatelse 274.
target: DONG E&P Norge will then again take over Mærsk Guardian to drill another exploration well on a prospect called Ipswich in the vicinity of the 1/3-6 discovery in production licence 274.

source: Oljedirektoratet har beregnet de utvinnbare ressursene basert på en letemodellanalyse.

source: «Det er svært positivt at Byrding nå er bygd ut og satt i produksjon.

target: A 127 metre gas column with good reservoir properties was proven.

source: Norsk sokkel bringer også et intervju med professor i geofysikk, Yngve Kristoffersen.
target: Norsk sokkel will also feature an interview with professor of geophysics Yngve Kristoffersen.

source: I mange tilfeller kan norske myndigheters krav til petroleumsvirksomhet i Barentshavet oppfylles ved bruk av eksisterende teknologi.
target: In many cases, Norwegian government reguirements for petroleum activity in the Barents Sea can be met with existing solutions.

source: Dette skyldes synkende materialpriser og at andre traseer blir valgt.
target: This is a result of falling prices for materials, and choosing different routes.

source: OD skal fortsatt ha et nært samarbeid med Petroleumstilsynet og stiftelsen Petrad i dette arbeidet.
target: The NPD will continue to cultivate close cooperation with the Petroleum Safety Authority Norway and the Petrad foundation in this work.

source: Brønnen ble boret til et vertikalt dyp på 2500 meter under havflaten, og ble avsluttet i Kolmuleformasjonen i nedre kritt.
target: The well was drilled to a vertical depth of 2500 metres below the sea surface, and was terminated in the Kolmule formation in the Lower Cretaceous.

source: Gassfunnet i brønnen er sannsynligvis en del av det samme hydrokarbonsystemet som ble funnet i grunnfjellet i 16/2-4.
target: The gas discovery in the well is probably part of the same hydrocarbon system found in the bedrock in 16/2-4.

source: Til tross for sin beliggenhet - 567 kilometer fra det nordligste punktet på norsk fastland - er store områder av Svalbard is- og snøfrie, i alle fall deler av året.
target: Despite lying 567 kilometres from the northernmost point of mainland Norway, large parts of them are free from snow and ice for at least part of the year.

source: Brønnen er boret om lag 5,5 kilometer nord for Framfeltet i nordlige Nordsjøen og om lag 130 kilometer nordvest for Bergen.
target: The well was drilled about 5.5 kilometres north of the Fram field in the northern North Sea, and about 130 kilometres northwest of Bergen.

source: En vurdering av åpning av den norske delen av Jan Mayen-ryggen må tas etter en ordinær prosess, som blant annet omfatter grundige konsekvensutredninger.
target: An evaluation concerning opening of the Norwegian part of the Jan Mayen Ridge must be made following an ordinary process, including thorough impact assessments.

source: Temperaturen i bergartene i Norskehavet øker raskere mot dypet enn i Mexicogolfen, og det er målt temperaturer opp mot 140-150 grader C.
target: The temperature in the rocks in the Norwegian Sea rises more rapidly as depth increases compared with the Gulf of Mexico, and temperatures up to 140-150 degrees C have been recorded.

source: Torsten Bertelsen, Norskehavet og Barentshavet
target: Torsten Bertelsen, Norwegian Sea and Barents Sea

target: Wells 35/8-6 S and 35/8-6 A were drilled by Borgland Dolphin, which is now heading for production licence 248 F in the North Sea to drill wildcat well 35/11-19 S, which is operated by Wintershall Norge AS.

target: The PDO covers the first stage of construction, with overall investments estimated at NOK 100 – 120 billion.

target: The ML, the NPD and, if relevant, Gassco submit their assessments to the MPE, while the PSA submits its assessment to ML.

target: The history of Frigg Frigg was the first field on the Norwegian shelf where a thin oil zone was proven, in the third largest gas field in Norway.

source: Utslippene fra olje- og gassvirksomheten har vært relativt stabile de siste ti årene.
target: Greenhouse gas emissions from oil and gas activities have been relatively stable over the past ten years.

target: The area in this licence consists of the blocks 7120/1 and 7120/2.

target: It is therefore important for the NPD to develop an organisation and work method

target: The area in this licence consists of the central to northern part of block 16/1, about 20 km northeast of the 15/3-1 S Gudrun discovery in the central part of the North Sea.

source: Så langt er bare Snøhvitfeltet kommersielt, mens Goliatfunnet er under vurdering.

target: The primary objective is to gain more knowledge on the startle response seismic has on fish and how long the fish stay away from an area following a period of seismic.

target: The liquid production in October was: 1 868 000 barrels of oil, 278 000 barrels of NGL and 84 000 barrels of condensate.

target: The overview shows complete history per field and total production per month and year.

target: The well will be drilled about 20 kilometres west of the 7220/11-1 (Alta) discovery well in production licence 609.

source: Jan Mayenryggen ble hevet opp i Oligocen for ca 30 millioner år siden.

source: Utgangspunktet er kartlegging av geologien på sokkelen, både i områder som er åpnet og i områder som ikke er åpnet for leting.
target: The point of departure is mapping of the geology on the shelf, both in areas that are opened and in areas that have not been opened for exploration.

target: The recoverable resources estimate is up to 0.5 million Sm3 oil.

target: You can access information on fields, production licences, companies, production and active exploration wells, as well as news.

source: Gratulerer med en stor begivenhet.
target: Congratulations on this major milestone.

source: Trollets dilemma Det finnes flere felt med tynne oljesoner på norsk sokkel.
target: The Troll dilemma There are several fields with thin oil zones on the Norwegian shelf.

source: - Dermed blir enhetskostnadene lavere, og levetiden for infrastrukturen kan forlenges, slik at det blir mulig å sette i verk tiltak for økt utvinning, sier direktør Jan Bygdevoll i OD.
target: This will mean lower unit costs and extended field lifetime, which also means that we can implement improved oil recovery measures, says director Jan Bygdevoll of the NPD.

target: The well proved gas.

source: Norge har god kompetanse på dette området, og det kommer godt med i kartleggingen vi nå er i gang med,” kommenterer Eva Halland.

source: Alle fartøy som samler inn seismikk på norsk sokkel skal ha en fiskerikyndig person om bord.
target: All vessels acquiring seismic data on the Norwegian shelf must have a fishery liaison on board.

source: Av disse er 19 undersøkelsesbrønner og 9 avgrensningsbrønner.
target: Of these, 19 were wildcat wells and nine were appraisal wells.

source: Ifølge foreløpige tall fra SSB og SFT var samlet norsk utslipp av NOx 179 000 tonn i 2008, en nedgang på åtte prosent fra året før.
target: According to preliminary figures from SSB and SFT, total Norwegian emissions of NOx amounted to 179 000 tonnes in 2008, a decline of eight per cent from the previous year.

source: Funnet bekrefter noe Oljedirektoratet og selskapene har vært klar over lenge, nemlig at det er dannet olje i området rundt Utsirahøyden, sier Kjøde:
target: The discovery confirms what the Norwegian Petroleum Directorate and the companies have known for some time; that oil has formed in the area around the Utsira High.

target: The appraisal wells were drilled to respective total depths of 3177 meters and 2961 meters TVD below the sea surface and were concluded in Upper Jurassic rocks.

source: Olje for utvikling ble etablert i 2005 og bygger på arbeid som er gjort gjennom mange år.
target: Established in 2005, the Oil for Development programme builds on work pursued over many years.

source: John Holbrook fra Texas Christian University presenterer nytenking innenfor sekvensstratigrafi, mens Ron Steel fra University of Austin snakker om Force-inspirerte studier.
target: John Holbrook from Texas Christian University will present innovations within sequence stratigraphy, while Ron Steel from the University of Austin will talk about Force-inspired studies.

source: Rettighetshavere er Petoro AS med 20 prosent og StatoilHydro med 40 % eierandel.
target: The other licensees are Petoro AS with 20 per cent and StatoilHydro with 40 percent ownership interest.

target: Well 16/3-8 S will be drilled from the Bredford Dolphin drilling facility at position 58°48’23.35’’ north and 02°40’27.67’’ east in production licence 501 in the central part of the North Sea.

source: Brønnen ble boret på prospektet ”Arenaria” i blokk 7224/6.
target: The well was drilled in the "Arenaria" prospect in block 7224/6.

source: Gassproduksjonen fortsetter å øke.
target: Gas production continues to rise.

source: Boreprogrammet for brønn 16/1-17 gjeld boring av undersøkingsbrønn i utvinningsløyve 338.
target: The drilling programme for well 16/1-17 concerns drilling of a wildcat well in production licence 338.

source: Økt aktivitet Høyere olje- og gasspriser har gitt større aktivitet i petroleumsnæringen.
target: Activity Higher oil and gas prices have boosted activity in the petroleum business.

source: Brønn 34/4-11 ble boret av boreinnretningen Songa Delta på 375 meters vanndyp.
target: Well 34/4-11 was drilled by the Songa Delta drilling facility in 375 metres of water.

source: Brønnen påtraff reservoarbergarter som forventet i Shetlandsgruppen.
target: The well encountered reservoir rocks as expected in the Shetland group.

source: Totalvolumet er 2,1 MSm3 o.e. høgare enn i 2016.
target: The total volume is 2.1 MSm3 o.e. higher than in 2016.

target: 16/2-5, oil/gas, 3-10 million cubic metres of recoverable gas.

source: Produksjonen på norsk sokkel er fortsatt høy.
target: The production rate on the Norwegian shelf is still high.

source: Brønnen påtraff en 18 meter oljekolonne i sandsteiner i Rognformasjonen med varierende fra god til meget god reservoarkvalitet.
target: The well encountered an 18-metre oil column in sandstones from the Rogn formation, with reservoir quality varying from good to very good.
